title: Free High-Tech Course that WORKS | Infinity Labs R&D
subtitle: Start your career in DevOps, Software Development, Cybersecurity & AI Research — no experience needed!
paragraph: I was an English teacher with zero software experience. Six months later, I graduated from Infinity Labs R&D’s intensive program and started working in high-tech.
paragraph2: Infinity Labs R&D offers free, full-time training tracks in Software Development, DevOps Engineering, Cybersecurity, and AI Research. Each 20–32 week program simulates a real workplace, includes mock interviews, career coaching, and guarantees job placement with top Israeli companies—no tuition fees up front.
